definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs

sentences.english: The CAR is home to diamonds and uranium, and there's talk of oil.
sentences.chinese: 中非共和國是鑽石和鈾礦之鄉，也還有石油。

sentences.english: The south-west of the country is extremely fertile and rainfall has been good.
sentences.chinese: 中非共和國西南部土地非常肥沃，雨量一直很好。

sentences.english: Kony was later pushed even further west in the Central African Republic.
sentences.chinese: 科尼後來甚至向西逃竄至中非共和國。

sentences.english: 1958 - Central African Republic becomes independent from France.
sentences.chinese: 1958年，中非共和國脫離法蘭西獨立。
